de.ityx.mediatrix.api.client

Interface ICPing


  • public interface ICPing
    Provides functions to manage the ping actions. The ping requests are sent and received. The requeued mails for the operator and subproject are shown at the start panel.
    How to use:
    API.getClientAPI().getPingAPI().ping();
